transcript:
Customer: Hello hello.
Executive: Haan ji meri aawaz aa rahi hai?
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Ji ji, mam yahi keh rahi hu ki maine sir ko haan sir ko maine call kiya tha na.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Hello, ji ji message woh aapko ki meeting pending tha unhone bola ki 5:30, 4:30 se 5:00 ke beech mein aapko connect karne ke liye. To usi ke liye maine aapko connect kiya hai. Right, meeting mein aapke number ji.
Customer: Abhi sir nahi hai.
Customer: Sir nahi hai, kuch kaam se bahar gaye hai.
Executive: Okay okay mam, no issue. Main filter options wagera aapko guide kar dungi, to koi fark nahi padega. Koi issue nahi hai, main aapko apni screen present karke filter option guide kar dungi. Main link bhejungi aap usko join kar lijiye.
Executive: Main aapke isi number ji.
Customer: Kya keh rahi hai?
Executive: Mam main aapke number pe meeting link bhej rahi hu, aap usko join kar lijiye. Main aapko sare filter option guide kar dungi then after main sir ko bhi update kar dungi iske regarding.
Customer: Okay. Mail ID pe bheja hai ki kya kis kaha pe?
Executive: Haan ji, haan ji maine aapki mail ID pe hi bheja hua hai. Register mail ID jo hai na aapki.
Customer: Haan ji, aap dekhiye maine mail ID pe bheja hai aapko.
Executive: Ki harshproducts@gmail.com ke naam se hai. Is mail pe gaya hua hai.
Executive: Abhi kya aapko mail receive hua hai mere naam se? Mera naam Srishti hai.
Customer: Ek minute mam, mera open nahi ho raha hai mera. Harsh ji mail ID sahi hai na?
Customer: Harsh product?
Executive: Haan, harsh product se maine bheja hai.
Customer: IndiaMART okay.
Executive: Mere naam se aaya hoga aapko srishti.shukla@indiamart.com ke naam se.
Customer: Nahi mam.
Customer: IndiaMART ka hai lekin woh buyleads ke buyleads ka hai.
Executive: Haan ji same wahi hai, wahi hai, wahi hai. Dekhiye video meeting aa raha hai isme Google Meet.
Customer: Waha pe koi link nahi hai.
Customer: Aapne harsh product ke mail kholiye right IndiaMART ki taraf se video meeting ka link aaya hua hai. Video meeting with the IndiaMART team aise karke aapko ek mail receive hua hai.
Customer: 17th of October.
Executive: Recent dekhiye just maine 5:15 ka meeting ka bheja hai. Aur aapko receive hua hoga yeh 5:01 pe.
Customer: Haan lekin waha pe koi link nahi hai. View latest buyleads.
Customer: Meeting link bhi ek minute rukiye, main aapko whatsapp pe bhej rahi hu main ek second rukiye.
Executive: Please secondary number aapke whatsapp pe hai?
Executive: Main aapko whatsapp pe bhej de rahi hu.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer unable to find meeting link in email.



Resolution:

- Executive offered to guide customer on filter options.

- Executive resent meeting link via WhatsApp.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- meeting link, filter options, whatsapp
